description: Charge Quickly at Home. Small but Powerful. Charge your iPad or iPad mini at the fastest possible speed with this charger that works in any power outlet. Works with the Lightning Connector. Use the Home Charger with the Lightning connector for iPad mini to charge faster than ever. And of course, you can still use your 30-pin cable.
title: Belkin MIXIT Home and Travel Wall Charger for iPad and iPhone (2.1 Amp), Pink
